title: Q3 - Can heirs or nominees access the data of a deceased person?
description: Yes — under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA), a Data Principal (the individual whose data is collected) can nominate another person to exercise their data rights in the event of their death or incapacity.
